Name: Salty Lychee Martini
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Pale pink in colour and subtle in flavour with gin and the delicately salty tang of manzanilla sherry and drying rich rose and lychee.
History: I created this drink in 2002 after trying Dick Bradsell 's Lychee & Rose Petal Martini .
Nutrition: One serving of Salty Lychee Martini contains 134 calories
